name: Return to Northbury Grove
description:
Liam Murphy is an aspiring actor looking to land the role of a lifetime at the infamous Rock the Warehouse music festival. Upon arriving at the desolate RTW concert grounds, Liam faces death itself after being kidnapped and thrown into the basement of the Spector Forest Slasher’s labyrinthian kill-house.

Now, Liam must use his wits and bravery to survive the traps, trials, and tribulations that lay before him. Will he become the Slasher’s latest victim or will he escape to the fresh air of freedom? Find out by confronting death and your own fears in…Return to Northbury Grove!

This immersive VR experience is a love letter to the slasher genre that elevates the terror and ratchets up the tension of the Northbury Grove franchise – so don’t make a sound, stay out of sight, and whatever you do, do not cross the Slasher. Let the blood curdling cries commence!


  • Next-Level Immersion: Experience every pulse-pounding moment in full 360-degree VR.
  • Physics First: The game is 100% physically simulated, from the player itself to almost every object and item found in all levels.
  • Haunting Atmosphere: The unsettling ambiance of Specter Forest and other mysterious places come to life like never before as you live the experience with the maximum immersion
  • Chilling Audio: Spatial Sound effects make you feel as if you're truly part of this living nightmare.
  • Unpredictable Gameplay: Your choices matter. Make decisions that impact your survival in real-time.
  • Adaptive AI: No two playthroughs are the same. The lurking terror adapts to your actions in real-time. Do you have what it takes to actually survive a horror movie?
  • Modifier Mania: Total Darkness? Guns Everywhere? Happy the Humble Heifer? Play with modifiers, the real game starts once you beat it the first time!
